billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Clarifies the scope of protections against discrimination on the basis of disability in services provided by public entities
summary: Clarifies the scope of protections against discrimination on the basis of disability in services provided by public entities including exclusion from participation or denial of benefits, services, programs or activities of a public entity and refusal of a public entity to make reasonable accommodations unless such entity can establish undue hardship; defines terms.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to certain unlawful discriminatory practices
